mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tg.`object_id` FROM `tarif_group` tg JOIN `tarif_group_attribute` a ON (tg.`object_id` = a.`object_id` AND a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND a.`attribute_type_id` = ${codeAT}) JOIN `tarif_group_string_culture` sc ON (a.`value_id` = sc.`id` AND sc.`value` = #{code} AND sc.`locale_id` = (SELECT l.`id` FROM `locales` l WHERE l.`system` = 1)) WHERE tg.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')
